[<Android.Runtime.Register("android/provider/CalendarContract$CalendarColumns", DoNotGenerateAcw=true)>]
[System.Obsolete("Use the 'Android.Provider.CalendarContract.ICalendarColumns' type. This class will be removed in a future release.")]

Docs.summary: Columns specific to the Calendars Uri that other Uris can query.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: [Android.Runtime.Register("ALLOWED_ATTENDEE_TYPES")]
[<Android.Runtime.Register("ALLOWED_ATTENDEE_TYPES")>]
[System.Obsolete("Use 'Android.Provider.CalendarContract.ICalendarColumns.AllowedAttendeeTypes'. This class will be removed in a future release.")]
[<System.Obsolete("Use 'Android.Provider.CalendarContract.ICalendarColumns.AllowedAttendeeTypes'. This class will be removed in a future release.")>]

Docs.summary: A comma separated list of attendee types supported for this calendar in the format "#,#,#".

remarks.para: A comma separated list of attendee types supported for this calendar in the format "#,#,#". Valid types are Attendees#TYPE_NONE, Attendees#TYPE_OPTIONAL, Attendees#TYPE_REQUIRED, Attendees#TYPE_RESOURCE. Setting this field to only Attendees#TYPE_NONE should be used to indicate that changing the attendee type is not supported.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: [Android.Runtime.Register("ALLOWED_AVAILABILITY")]
[<Android.Runtime.Register("ALLOWED_AVAILABILITY")>]
[System.Obsolete("Use 'Android.Provider.CalendarContract.ICalendarColumns.AllowedAvailability'. This class will be removed in a future release.")]
[<System.Obsolete("Use 'Android.Provider.CalendarContract.ICalendarColumns.AllowedAvailability'. This class will be removed in a future release.")>]

Docs.summary: A comma separated list of availability types supported for this calendar in the format "#,#,#".

remarks.para: A comma separated list of availability types supported for this calendar in the format "#,#,#". Valid types are Events#AVAILABILITY_BUSY, Events#AVAILABILITY_FREE, Events#AVAILABILITY_TENTATIVE. Setting this field to only Events#AVAILABILITY_BUSY should be used to indicate that changing the availability is not supported.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: [Android.Runtime.Register("ALLOWED_REMINDERS")]
[<Android.Runtime.Register("ALLOWED_REMINDERS")>]
[System.Obsolete("Use 'Android.Provider.CalendarContract.ICalendarColumns.AllowedReminders'. This class will be removed in a future release.")]
[<System.Obsolete("Use 'Android.Provider.CalendarContract.ICalendarColumns.AllowedReminders'. This class will be removed in a future release.")>]

Docs.summary: A comma separated list of reminder methods supported for this calendar in the format "#,#,#".

remarks.para: A comma separated list of reminder methods supported for this calendar in the format "#,#,#". Valid types are Reminders#METHOD_DEFAULT, Reminders#METHOD_ALERT, Reminders#METHOD_EMAIL, Reminders#METHOD_SMS, Reminders#METHOD_ALARM. Column name.
Type: TEXT
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The color of the calendar.

remarks.para: The color of the calendar. This should only be updated by the sync adapter, not other apps, as changing a calendar's color can adversely affect its display.
Type: INTEGER (color value)
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: [Android.Runtime.Register("CALENDAR_COLOR_KEY")]

[System.Obsolete("Use 'Android.Provider.CalendarContract.ICalendarColumns.CalendarColorKey'. This class will be removed in a future release.")]
[<System.Obsolete("Use 'Android.Provider.CalendarContract.ICalendarColumns.CalendarColorKey'. This class will be removed in a future release.")>]

Docs.summary: A key for looking up a color from the Colors table.

remarks.para: A key for looking up a color from the Colors table. NULL or an empty string are reserved for indicating that the calendar does not use a key for looking up the color. The provider will update #CALENDAR_COLOR automatically when a valid key is written to this column. The key must reference an existing row of the Colors table.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Is this the primary calendar for this account.

remarks.para: Is this the primary calendar for this account. If this column is not explicitly set, the provider will return 1 if Calendars#ACCOUNT_NAME is equal to Calendars#OWNER_ACCOUNT.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Is this calendar synced and are its events stored on the device? 0 - Do not sync this calendar or store events for this calendar.

remarks.para: Is this calendar synced and are its events stored on the device? 0 - Do not sync this calendar or store events for this calendar. 1 - Sync down events for this calendar.
Type: INTEGER (boolean)
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
